pageContext.claim: “They [Democrats] don't want to fund Israel. They want to take away foreign aid to Israel. They want to do a lot of bad things to Israel. In my opinion, you vote for a Democrat, you're being very disloyal to Jewish people and you're being very disloyal to Israel. And only weak people would say anything other than that.”
pageContext.analysis: False. There are some Democratic critics of the policies of the Netanyahu government, but many Democrats support Israel and aid to that country. This is especially true of senior Democratic lawmakers such as Sen. Robert Menendez, the ranking Democrat on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.
